text: The "Bubble Butt" artist responded to tweets directed at him referring to the ranking. His frustrations with the headlines about his skills in bed compared to Mayer's and Bloom's are quite clear from his responses below. To one fan, he responded with a picture of him flipping off the camera. He replied to another, "I don't even remember having sex." And finally, he shared a picture of himself during a show with the caption, "I won the bronze metal in the sex olympics," referring to his third place status.
